body: @Aralanit, agreed but if this was meaningless shit then y are you here? Y do you think people are on this site? Because of meaningless shit. And if this makes you say that, you have a long long way to go. Cuz there are more fucked up shit that you problably haven't seen. I'm not trying to be a smart ass but I'm just saying whatever was on my mind just now. Tq for reading and have a pleasant day! (If you even read this )
